Two cars are parked outside on a hot, sunny day. The cars are the same size and shape. One car is black and the other is white. They have been parked in the Sun for four hours.
The roof of the black car compared to the roof of the white car is most likely

A.Choice: cooler, because it absorbs more sunlight

B.Choice: cooler, because it absorbs less sunlight

C.Choice: warmer, because it absorbs more sunlight

D.Choice: warmer, because it absorbs less sunlight
